attributes.action: make foreign people serve our country in some way for the time that they are here
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: foreign people are in our country many claiming benifits however there is a large amount who come to england and work and are happy with our way of life and fit in however i feel if they come here then they should at least serve our country in some way

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
